subject: Missing content from shipment
description_text:
So I have order #9274 where I was supposed to get the simpson plus x pedals
with 1 haptic sensor and also a base plate, but instead I just got the
pedals. May I ask if it was meant to be sent on a later date or forgotten
all along?

P.S. If any photos need to be attached please inform me.

conversations.body_text: I made an error with the order number. The correct one is: #SSN2923
Hi Ilin Krastev,    This is your Haptics logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2528600704057906
